title: Media Factory: Media Generation (Image, Video, Music, Narration)
intro:
Your **hero concept** is only as convincing as the **sensory experience** around it.

In this phase you'll **manufacture** a **mini media kit**—hero image, brand jingle, and narrated voice-over—that will power your explainer video, website, investor teaser, and social posts.

By **running** the three generation tracks **in parallel** you can operate like an in-house creative agency, **compressing days of design into minutes**.
estimatedTime: 20 minutes (18 min online creation running in parallel, ~2 min coordination)

fields.label: Visual Style
fields.help: Choose the overall visual approach for your hero image
fields.tooltip: Defines the aesthetic direction for all visual assets. Photoreal works for tangible products, stylized illustration for tech/apps, minimalist for premium brands, and bold/dramatic for disruptive concepts.

fields.label: Perspective
fields.help: Choose the perspective for your hero image
fields.tooltip: Determines the focal emphasis of your hero image. Close-up highlights product details, interaction scene shows usage, lifestyle context demonstrates benefits, abstract/conceptual communicates brand values.

fields.label: Music Genre
fields.placeholder: e.g., Upbeat electronic, Warm acoustic, Corporate cinematic
fields.help: Describe the musical style that matches your brand
fields.tooltip: Sets the emotional tone for your brand jingle and background music. Upbeat electronic suits tech products, warm acoustic works for family brands, corporate cinematic fits B2B services.

fields.label: Voice Persona
fields.help: Choose the voice character for your narration
fields.tooltip: Defines the personality and tone for all spoken content including explainer videos, ads, and voice agents. Should align with your target audience's preferences and brand personality.

fields.label: Featured Statistic
fields.placeholder: Select one jaw-dropping statistic from Section B of Science_Evidence.pdf
fields.help: Choose the most compelling statistic to feature in your narration
fields.tooltip: The most credible, impressive data point from your Phase 3 research that will grab attention and validate your solution. This becomes the hook that opens your narrated content and marketing materials.

promptTemplate:
**PURPOSE**: Create an engaging 60-second voiceover script that introduces our company's solution in a way that builds trust, demonstrates value, and motivates action. This script should work as background narration on our website, over promotional videos, or as standalone audio content.

**SCRIPT REQUIREMENTS:**

Write a 60-second narration introducing **{{phase5.chosen_concept_code_name}}**, our new {{phase1.sector}} solution.

• Hook potential customers in the first line using this statistic: "{{selected_statistic}}"
• Weave in this expert pull-quote for credibility: "[Pull-quote from Science_Evidence.pdf]"
• Describe one key interactive feature and expected benefit in ≤ 25 words
• End with a rousing call to action (<15 words)

Tone: {{voice_persona}} (warm, encouraging, trustworthy).

Output plain text only.

decisionBoxContent.title: Creative Direction & Team Setup
decisionBoxContent.subtitle: Make these shared decisions before splitting into parallel production tracks

items.label: 🛠️ Tools & Platform Access
items.content:
**Required Platforms:**

🎨 **Track A** (Hero Image): Sora
🎵 **Track B** (Music): Suno.ai
🎙️ **Track C** (Narration): ChatGPT + ElevenLabs
📝 **Track D** (Website Copy): Claude
📻 **Track E** (Podcast): NotebookLM

**Pre-Check:** Ensure team members have accounts and access to these platforms before beginning.

items.label: 👥 Team Role Assignment
items.content:
**Parallel Production Strategy:**

• Assign one teammate per track (A-E)
• Each person works independently on their assigned track
• Coordinate timing to finish simultaneously
• **Total Duration:** ~20 minutes (18 min creation + 2 min coordination)

items.label: 📋 Asset Naming Convention
items.content:
**File Naming Standards:**

• Hero Image → `hero.png`
• Brand Jingle → `jingle.mp3`
• Voiceover → `voiceover.mp3`
• Website Copy → `copy.txt`
• Podcast → `podcast.mp3`

**Organization:** Create a shared project folder for all generated assets.

action.title: 🎯 Creative Direction Decisions
items: 🎨 **Visual Style:** Choose aesthetic approach (Photoreal, Stylized illustration, Minimalist, or Bold/Dramatic)
📐 **Image Perspective:** Select focal emphasis (Close-up glamour, Interaction scene, Lifestyle context, or Abstract/Conceptual)
🎵 **Music Genre:** Define brand-aligned musical style (e.g., Upbeat electronic, Warm acoustic, Corporate cinematic)
🎙️ **Voice Persona:** Select narrator character (Friendly parent, Energetic coach, Trusted expert, or Professional advisor)
📊 **Featured Statistic:** Choose most compelling data point from Science_Evidence.pdf for narrative hook

steps.action: Open Sora → Select 'Image' → Choose aspect ratio → Enable '4v' for 4 simultaneous variations
**Prompt Strategy:** Describe your hero image using selected visual style and perspective. Example: 'Photoreal close-up glamour shot of [your product] in premium lighting'
Generate multiple batches → Refine prompts based on results → Test different angles and compositions
Select best variation → Download → Rename to `hero.png` → Save to project folder
**Optional:** Generate conceptual videos for website backgrounds (Sora excels at abstract/conceptual motion graphics)
Open Suno.ai → Click 'Create' in sidebar → **Choose Mode:** 'Simple' for style description OR 'Custom' for specific lyrics
**Strategic Prompting:** Combine your brand adjectives with chosen music genre. Be specific about mood, energy level, and intended use as brand jingle.
Submit prompt → Wait for generation (~2 min) → **Pro Tip:** Free accounts have limited generations, so craft thoughtful prompts
Review all variations → Choose version that best captures brand essence → Download → Rename to `jingle.mp3`
**ChatGPT Phase:** Use the provided prompt template → Input your selected statistic and pull-quote → Generate 60-second script → Review and refine for natural flow
**ElevenLabs Setup:** Access app → Browse 'Instant Speech' → Explore voice library → Match voice to your chosen persona (Friendly parent, Energetic coach, etc.)
Paste finalized script → Generate speech → Preview for quality and tone → Download → Rename to `voiceover.mp3`
**Team Alignment:** Define target audience, primary message, and desired user action. Clarify brand tone using your three brand adjectives.

**Claude Instructions:** Create detailed prompt requesting expert copywriter persona → Specify copy elements needed (headline, sub-headline, body copy, bullet points, call-to-action) → Reference brand adjectives for tone
Open Claude → Upload `Hero_Concept_Detailed_Brief.docx` AND `Science_Evidence.pdf` → Submit comprehensive prompt
Review generated copy for brand alignment → Request revisions if needed → Download final version → Save as `copy.txt`
Open notebooklm.google.com → Create new notebook → Assign descriptive project name
**Content Integration:** Upload `Science_Evidence.pdf` → Add any additional research documents → Allow processing time for AI analysis
Click 'Audio Overview' → Wait for podcast generation (~2-3 minutes) → AI creates conversational discussion format
Access completed audio → Preview for quality → Download → Rename to `podcast.mp3` → Save to project folder

expectedOutput.fileCreated:
🎯 **Complete Media Kit Assets:**

• `hero.png` - Brand hero image
• `jingle.mp3` - Custom brand music
• `voiceover.mp3` - Professional narration
• `copy.txt` - Website copywriting
• `podcast.mp3` - Educational content
expectedOutput.whyItMatters:
**Asset Applications:**

🎨 **Hero Image:** Website header, video thumbnails, social media posts
🎙️ **Voiceover:** Explainer videos, website auto-play, marketing content
🎵 **Brand Jingle:** Background music, website audio branding, social media
📝 **Website Copy:** Homepage content, marketing materials, pitch decks
📻 **Podcast:** Educational content, thought leadership, content marketing
expectedOutput.nextSteps: **Quality Check:** Verify all assets align with brand adjectives and visual identity. Your complete media kit is now ready for Phase 7's website and video production workflows.
